subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Pavel Datsyuk scored twice in the first period and then again with 2 minutes 41 seconds remaining in the Detroit Red Wings’ 5-2 victory over the Stars in Dallas.
snippet: Pavel Datsyuk scored twice in the first period and then again with 2 minutes 41 seconds remaining in the Detroit Red Wings’ 5-2 victory over the Stars in Dallas.
